text: Yusuf Kenan Sönmez (1948 – 3 April 2020) was a Turkish politician and businessman. He was born in Zonguldak, Turkey. He represented Istanbul in the Grand National Assembly from 1987 to 1991. He was a member of both Social Democratic Populist Party and Republican People's Party. On 25 March 2020, he was diagnosed with COVID-19. On 3 April 2020, he died due to problems from the infection in Istanbul. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Istanbul Category:Turkish politicians Category:Turkish businesspeople
title: Yusuf Kenan Sönmez
